verses.verse: And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> when Ehud <S%H261><s%> was dead. <S%H4191><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> sold <S%H4376><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Jabin <S%H2985><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> that <S%H834><s%> reigned <S%H4427><s%> in Hazor; <S%H2674><s%> the captain <S%H8269><s%> of whose host <S%H6635><s%> was Sisera, <S%H5516><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in Harosheth of the Gentiles. <S%H2800><s%> <S%H1471><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> cried <S%H6817><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> he had nine <S%H8672><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> chariots <S%H7393><s%> of iron; <S%H1270><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> mightily <S%H2393><s%> oppressed <S%H3905><s%> <S%H853><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And Deborah, <S%H1683><s%> a prophetess, <S%H5031><s%> <S%H802><s%> the wife <S%H802><s%> of Lapidoth, <S%H3941><s%> she <S%H1931><s%> judged <S%H8199><s%> <S%H853><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> at that <S%H1931><s%> time. <S%H6256><s%>

And she <S%H1931><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the palm tree <S%H8560><s%> of Deborah <S%H1683><s%> between <S%H996><s%> Ramah <S%H7414><s%> and Bethel <S%H1008><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Ephraim: <S%H669><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%> to <S%H413><s%> her for judgment. <S%H4941><s%>

And she sent <S%H7971><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> Barak <S%H1301><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Abinoam <S%H42><s%> out of Kedesh-naphtali, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6943><s%> <S%H5320><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, Hath not <S%H3808><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> commanded, <S%H6680><s%> saying, Go <S%H1980><s%> and draw <S%H4900><s%> toward mount <S%H2022><s%> Tabor, <S%H8396><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> thee ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%> of the children <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> and of the children <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> of Zebulun? <S%H2074><s%>

And I will draw <S%H4900><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee to <S%H413><s%> the river <S%H5158><s%> Kishon <S%H7028><s%> <S%H853><s%> Sisera, <S%H5516><s%> the captain <S%H8269><s%> of Jabin's <S%H2985><s%> army, <S%H6635><s%> with his chariots <S%H7393><s%> and his multitude; <S%H1995><s%> and I will deliver <S%H5414><s%> him into thine hand. <S%H3027><s%>

And Barak <S%H1301><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> her, If <S%H518><s%> thou wilt go <S%H1980><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> me, then I will go: <S%H1980><s%> but if <S%H518><s%> thou wilt not <S%H3808><s%> go <S%H1980><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> me, then I will not <S%H3808><s%> go. <S%H1980><s%>

And she said, <S%H559><s%> I will surely go <S%H1980><s%> <S%H1980><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> thee: notwithstanding <S%H3808><s%> <S%H57><s%> the journey <S%H1870><s%> that <S%H834><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> takest <S%H1980><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> for thine honor; <S%H8597><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall sell <S%H4376><s%> <S%H853><s%> Sisera <S%H5516><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of a woman. <S%H802><s%> And Deborah <S%H1683><s%> arose, <S%H6965><s%> and went <S%H1980><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> Barak <S%H1301><s%> to Kedesh. <S%H6943><s%>

And Barak <S%H1301><s%> called <S%H2199><s%> <S%H853><s%> Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> and Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> to Kedesh; <S%H6943><s%> and he went up <S%H5927><s%> with ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%> at his feet: <S%H7272><s%> and Deborah <S%H1683><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> him.

Now Heber <S%H2268><s%> the Kenite, <S%H7014><s%> which was of the children <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> of Hobab <S%H2246><s%> the father-in-law <S%H2859><s%> of Moses, <S%H4872><s%> had severed himself <S%H6504><s%> from the Kenites, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7017><s%> and pitched <S%H5186><s%> his tent <S%H168><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the plain <S%H436><s%> of Zaanaim, <S%H6815><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is by <S%H854><s%> Kedesh. <S%H6943><s%>

And they showed <S%H5046><s%> Sisera <S%H5516><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> Barak <S%H1301><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Abinoam <S%H42><s%> was gone up <S%H5927><s%> to mount <S%H2022><s%> Tabor. <S%H8396><s%>

And Sisera <S%H5516><s%> gathered together <S%H2199><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his chariots, <S%H7393><s%> even nine <S%H8672><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> chariots <S%H7393><s%> of iron, <S%H1270><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were with <S%H854><s%> him, from Harosheth of the Gentiles <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2800><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the river <S%H5158><s%> of Kishon. <S%H7028><s%>

And Deborah <S%H1683><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Barak, <S%H1301><s%> Up; <S%H6965><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> is the day <S%H3117><s%> in which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath delivered <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> Sisera <S%H5516><s%> into thine hand: <S%H3027><s%> is not <S%H3808><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> gone out <S%H3318><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee? So Barak <S%H1301><s%> went down <S%H3381><s%> from mount <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2022><s%> Tabor, <S%H8396><s%> and ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> discomfited <S%H2000><s%> <S%H853><s%> Sisera, <S%H5516><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his chariots, <S%H7393><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his host, <S%H4264><s%> with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Barak; <S%H1301><s%> so that Sisera <S%H5516><s%> lighted down <S%H3381><s%> off <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> his chariot, <S%H4818><s%> and fled away <S%H5127><s%> on his feet. <S%H7272><s%>

But Barak <S%H1301><s%> pursued <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the chariots, <S%H7393><s%> and after <S%H310><s%> the host, <S%H4264><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> Harosheth of the Gentiles: <S%H2800><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the host <S%H4264><s%> of Sisera <S%H5516><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> upon the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword; <S%H2719><s%> and there was not <S%H3808><s%> a man <S%H259><s%> left. <S%H7604><s%>

Howbeit Sisera <S%H5516><s%> fled away <S%H5127><s%> on his feet <S%H7272><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> of Jael <S%H3278><s%> the wife <S%H802><s%> of Heber <S%H2268><s%> the Kenite: <S%H7017><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> there was peace <S%H7965><s%> between <S%H996><s%> Jabin <S%H2985><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Hazor <S%H2674><s%> and the house <S%H1004><s%> of Heber <S%H2268><s%> the Kenite. <S%H7017><s%>

And Jael <S%H3278><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> Sisera, <S%H5516><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, Turn in, <S%H5493><s%> my lord, <S%H113><s%> turn in <S%H5493><s%> to <S%H413><s%> me; fear <S%H3372><s%> not. <S%H408><s%> And when he had turned in <S%H5493><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> her into the tent, <S%H168><s%> she covered <S%H3680><s%> him with a mantle. <S%H8063><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> her, Give me, I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> a little <S%H4592><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> to drink; <S%H8248><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I am thirsty. <S%H6770><s%> And she opened <S%H6605><s%> <S%H853><s%> a bottle <S%H4997><s%> of milk, <S%H2461><s%> and gave him drink, <S%H8248><s%> and covered <S%H3680><s%> him.

Again he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> her, Stand <S%H5975><s%> in the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tent, <S%H168><s%> and it shall be, <S%H1961><s%> when <S%H518><s%> any man <S%H376><s%> doth come <S%H935><s%> and inquire <S%H7592><s%> of thee, and say, <S%H559><s%> Is <S%H3426><s%> there any man <S%H376><s%> here? <S%H6311><s%> that thou shalt say, <S%H559><s%> No. <S%H369><s%>

Then Jael <S%H3278><s%> Heber's <S%H2268><s%> wife <S%H802><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> a nail <S%H3489><s%> of the tent, <S%H168><s%> and took <S%H7760><s%> <S%H853><s%> a hammer <S%H4718><s%> in her hand, <S%H3027><s%> and went <S%H935><s%> softly <S%H3814><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, and smote <S%H8628><s%> <S%H853><s%> the nail <S%H3489><s%> into his temples, <S%H7451><s%> and fastened <S%H6795><s%> it into the ground: <S%H776><s%> for he <S%H1931><s%> was fast asleep <S%H7290><s%> and weary. <S%H5774><s%> So he died. <S%H4191><s%>

And, behold, <S%H2009><s%> as Barak <S%H1301><s%> pursued <S%H7291><s%> <S%H853><s%> Sisera, <S%H5516><s%> Jael <S%H3278><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> him, and said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Come, <S%H1980><s%> and I will show <S%H7200><s%> thee <S%H853><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> seekest. <S%H1245><s%> And when he came <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> her tent, behold, <S%H2009><s%> Sisera <S%H5516><s%> lay <S%H5307><s%> dead, <S%H4191><s%> and the nail <S%H3489><s%> was in his temples. <S%H7451><s%>

So God <S%H430><s%> subdued <S%H3665><s%> on that <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jabin <S%H2985><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> prospered, <S%H1980><s%> and prevailed <S%H1980><s%> <S%H7186><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Jabin <S%H2985><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H834><s%> they had destroyed <S%H3772><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jabin <S%H2985><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Canaan. <S%H3667><s%>
